category.name: Integration.Configuring CAE
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CAE_create_GeneratedByRelationship
preference.preference_description: This is an optional preference. It allows an administrator to control whether a CAE Structure Map relationship is maintained between the root item revision of the created structure and the defining CAE Structure Map.This option activates the creation of a CAE-specific relationship between the CAEModel/CAEGeometry item revision (or any of its subtypes) and a referenced CAE Structure Map item revision where the CAEModel item revision is the primary contributor to the relationship. This does not apply to creation of CAE structures using data maps. Valid Values: 0 - CAE Structure Map relationship is not maintained. 1 - CAE Structure Map relationship is maintained by default.
